price: Basi zilipo wafikia Ishara zetu hizo zenye kuonyesha, wakasema: Huu ni uchawi dhaahiri.
arabic: فَلَمَّا جَآءَتۡهُمۡ ءَايَٰتُنَا مُبۡصِرَةٗ قَالُواْ هَٰذَا سِحۡرٞ مُّبِينٞ
footnotes: Ilipo kuja miujiza hii kwa uwazi na dhaahiri wakasema: Huu ni uchawi wazi!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: falammā jāathum āyātunā mub'ṣiratan qālū hādhā siḥ'run mubīnun
